revised_title: A New Type of Orbitolites: Insights into the Evolution of Foraminifera
tldr: The author discovers a new type of Orbitolites, which provides a complete transition between the Milioline and Orbitoline plans of growth in foraminifera. This new type of Orbitolites supports the author's classification principles and challenges previous classifications by M. D'Orbigny. The research sheds light on the evolution and descent of foraminifera, showing the relationship between Orbitolites and Orbiculina.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Evolutionary Biology
